column4: okay, I'm duel booting Ubuntu 6.10 and Puppy 2.15CE. I wanna change out the Puppy HDD for another 40GB Hdd that I Have, I wanna put Freespire 2.0 on it when its out. will replacing a Duel-Booted HDD mess my Edgy install up? thanks.
you can't mess anything up unless you remove the partition with the grub stage 1.5 files
don't remove the partition that has the distro you used to install grub
